inclusion.criterion: spouse of woman diagnosed with breast cancer
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient is married to a woman who has been diagnosed with breast cancer

inclusion.criterion: married or cohabiting for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient and spouse have been married for 5 years

inclusion.criterion: English as one of their languages of choice
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: live within 25 miles of the University of Washington study center
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no information provided about patient's location

inclusion.criterion: willing to give a sample of blood and/or sputum at time of first and second data collections
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient is willing to participate in the study

exclusion.criterion: woman diagnosed with stage IV or recurrent breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no information provided about patient's breast cancer diagnosis

exclusion.criterion: woman and/or spouse not able to read and write in English
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: no information provided about patient's language skills

notes: Patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She has been married for 5 years and speaks English.
